description: Lists all ``PrincipalARN``s and corresponding ``PrincipalType``s associated with the specified portfolio.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

nested_items.name: Principals
nested_items.description: The ``PrincipalARN``s and corresponding ``PrincipalType``s associated with the portfolio.

nested_items.name: PrincipalARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the principal (user, role, or group). This field allows for an ARN with no accountID, with or without wildcard characters if the PrincipalType is an IAM_PATTERN.

nested_items.name: PrincipalType
nested_items.description: The principal type. The supported value is IAM if you use a fully defined ARN, or IAM_PATTERN if you use an ARN with no accountID, with or without wildcard characters.

nested_items.name: NextPageToken
nested_items.description: The page token to use to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.
